name: Ghost King's Cross
description:
GHOST KING'S CROSS

You are a ghost — the Ghost King to be precise, and you're PISSED. The land your graveyard sits upon has long since been the central hub of otherworldly spectres. However, the mortal world has begun annexing your land for some municipal construction project. Team after team of human exterminators have arrived to evict you, awakening a ghostly fury within. Play as the Ghost King and embark on a one-spirit mission to spread your ectoplasm seeds of chaos and drive away the humans trying to destroy your home. The battle awaits...

Ghost King’s Cross is a charming 2D, side-scrolling bullet hell where you play as the Ghost King defending his graveyard home! Shooting spirit blasts will increase your damage, but be careful not to get hit by the humans — or get caught in your own crossfire!

Move — WASD or Arrows
Aim — Mouse
Shoot — Left Mouse or Space
Dash — Right Mouse or Left Shift
